god.serifex.name: Serifex, God of Fresh Water
god.serifex.description: Wearing an androgynous guise of indeterminate age, Serifex is wreathed in glittering white robes, with a silver crown upon their golden-locked head.

god.loruch.name: Loruch, God of Trees
god.loruch.description: What you can see of Loruch is an old, bearded man. He stands spread-eagled with his back to the massive stump of a once-great tree, ensconced by vines that threaten to consume him entirely.

god.fulminar.name: Fulminar, God of Storms
god.fulminar.description: With a thin, angular face and silver-blue hair, this god wears an eclectic set of robes and sashes in bright and clashing color. He sits on the edge of the floating island, watching debris gently float by.

god.bezfultam.name: Bez-Fultam, Twin God of the Forge
god.bezfultam.description: Stocky, muscular, and clean-shaven, this god bears a strong resemblance to his sister. He sweats at a smelter, burning the impurities out of divine ore, and then helping his sister pound the ingots into shape.

god.yabfultam.name: Yab-Fultam, Twin Goddess of the Forge
god.yabfultam.description: Stocky and muscular, this goddess bears a strong resemblance to her brother. She pounds divine metal into shape on an anvil as her brother holds it in place, and then quenches it with a hiss.
